rules.description: SpaceFN: Space enables SpaceFN mode (see: https://geekhack.org/index.php?topic=51069.0 & https://spacelauncherapp.com)
SpaceFN: Space+[hjkl] to Left, Down, Up, Right
SpaceFN: Space+u to Page Up, Space+d to Page Down
SpaceFN: Space+s to Space (hold to repeat)
Caps Lock → Hyper Key (⌃⌥⌘) | Escape if alone | Use fn + caps lock to enable caps lock
Home row mods - ctrl, opt, shift, command
